Scranton.Lackawanna College:
Lackawanna College (formerly Lackawanna Junior College, originally Scranton Business College) is a private university in Scranton, Pennsylvania, with satellite centers in the towns of Hazleton, Hawley, Towanda, and New Milford.


== History ==
The college began as a proprietary institution with a full academic program under the direction of H.D. Buck and A.R. Whitmore. John H. Seeley, a noted regional educator, purchased it in 1912.
